## renderMarkdown() function

Renders markdown content with terminal styling. Detects terminal background (light/dark) and applies appropriate styling.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function renderMarkdown(content: string, options?: RenderMarkdownOptions): string;
```

</td></tr>

string

The styled markdown output
